top_matches.title: [Ibis] Update direct uses of replaceAllUsesWith.
top_matches.author: mikeurbach
top_matches.summary: Issue about DialectConversion triggering asserts on replaceAllUsesWith usage. Related to RAUW but in Ibis dialect, not LLHD. Different context - about API usage in conversion patterns.

top_matches.title: circt-verilog --ir-hw produces multiple seq.firreg for a single Verilog reg
top_matches.author: gipsyh
top_matches.summary: Multiple drivers to same reg causing multiple seq.firreg generation. Related to multiple driver handling but no crash - just incorrect output. Different pipeline (--ir-hw), not LLHD/Sig2Reg.

top_matches.title: [circt-opt] Segmentation fault during XOR op building
top_matches.author: likeamahoney
top_matches.summary: Segfault in llhd-desequentialize pass when processing Verilog. Different crash - during XOR op building, not Sig2Reg. Uses llhd.process but crashes in comb::XorOp verifier.

top_matches.title: [circt-verilog] `circt-verilog` produces non `comb`/`seq` dialects including `cf` and `llhd`
top_matches.author: AtticusKuhn
top_matches.summary: circt-verilog produces cf and llhd dialects unexpectedly. Not a crash - just unexpected dialect output. Uses LLHD but is about output format, not Sig2Reg.

top_matches.title: [Moore][Arc][LLHD] Moore to LLVM lowering issues
top_matches.author: likeamahoney
top_matches.summary: Issues with Moore to LLVM lowering using llhd-sig2reg pass. Different error - 'failed to legalize operation seq.clock_inv'. Not an assertion failure in RAUW.

top_matches.title: [LLHD][Arc] Indexing and slicing lowering from Verilog to LLVM IR
top_matches.author: AndreyVV-100
top_matches.summary: Arcilator fails with 'body contains non-pure operation' after sig2reg pass. Different error - not an assertion. About indexing/slicing support.

top_matches.title: [Moore] Input triggers assertion in canonicalizer infra
top_matches.author: maerhart
top_matches.summary: Assertion in canonicalizer for Moore dialect. Different assertion - 'expected that op has no uses' in PatternMatch.cpp. Moore dialect, not LLHD Sig2Reg.

top_matches.title: InnerSymbols: Improvements, ideas, wishlist
top_matches.author: dtzSiFive
top_matches.summary: Tracking issue for InnerSymbol improvements including RAUW support. Not a bug report - just tracking improvements. Mentions RAUW as a feature to add.

analysis_summary: No existing issues found that match the specific crash pattern: Sig2RegPass assertion failure 'cannot RAUW a value with itself' caused by self-referential continuous assignment. The closest matches involve RAUW/replaceAllUsesWith but in different contexts (Ibis dialect conversion, InnerSymbol tracking). LLHD-related issues exist but describe different failures (segfault in XorOp, legalization errors). This appears to be a unique bug in Sig2RegPass handling of self-referential assignments.
